chapters.title: A Departing Adventure
chapters.content: Little by little, the family said goodbye to their friends, neighbors and anyone who might've crossed their past, until they reached the point of departing in a state of contentment and excitement. For the first time ever, they were going to journey through a long-distance space flight, travelling to distant stars and exploring a world of wonders.
chapters.illustration: A colorful, ornate rocket launches in the night sky. A flurry of vibrant plumes flow out of it, cascading in all different colors.

chapters.title: Sweet Dreams in Slumber
chapters.content: As the ship began its sail, the kid in the family rushed to the bedroom in glee. To her, this pleasant journey away from the realities of life was one of the most attractive features of space travel. Her parents helped her get ready for bed and instructed their friendly AI crew to send in lullabies to put her to sleep. After a few minutes, the child was tucked away in her blanket, starting a deep slumber through which she would rest until they arrived in the strange new place.
chapters.illustration: The child is peacefully sleeping in her room, while the figures of her parents are shown entering the control cabin.

chapters.title: Waking Up In A New World
chapters.content: Several hours into the flight, the AI crew alerted the kid's parents that their destination was closer than expected. As the parents excitedly prepare for their first landfall, the AI crew gradually begin to increase the noise volume inside of the kid's room in order to wake her up from her slumber. With each passing second, the control cabin also became louder, jolting the sleeping kid to reality. Suddenly, she opens her eyes and finds herself in a brand new world.
chapters.illustration: The windows of the bedroom in space shine with a mysterious and inviting light, revealing a sight of giant planets radiating different colors.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
"""

messages.name: Assy
